Classes/MBCMicroblinkSDK.html#/c:objc(cs.name: +isScanningUnsupportedForCameraType:error:
Classes/MBCMicroblinkSDK.html#/c:objc(cs.abstract: This method returns true when scanning is unsupported on a specific device.

Classes/MBCImage.html#/c:objc(cs)MBCImag.name: roi
Classes/MBCImage.html#/c:objc(cs)MBCImag.abstract: Region of the image used for scanning, where the whole image is specified with CGRectMake(0.0, 0.0, 1.0, 1.0).

Classes/MBCImage.html#/c:objc(cs)MBCImag.name: orientation
Classes/MBCImage.html#/c:objc(cs)MBCImag.abstract: Processing orientation of image. This is used in OCR where you can specify character orientation.

Classes/MBCImage.html#/c:objc(cs)MBCImag.name: mirroredHorizontally
Classes/MBCImage.html#/c:objc(cs)MBCImag.abstract: Tells whether camera input images should be mirrored horizontally before processing

Classes/MBCImage.html#/c:objc(cs)MBCImag.name: mirroredVertically
Classes/MBCImage.html#/c:objc(cs)MBCImag.abstract: Tells whether camera input images should be mirrored vertically before processing

Classes/MBCImage.html#/c:objc(cs)MBCImag.name: estimateFrameQuality
Classes/MBCImage.html#/c:objc(cs)MBCImag.abstract: If YES, the image will prior to processing go through frame quality estimation phase, which might discard the frame

Classes/MBCImage.html#/c:objc(cs)MBCImag.name: cameraFrame
Classes/MBCImage.html#/c:objc(cs)MBCImag.abstract: Property which tells if this frame is a camera or a single photo frame.

Classes/MBCFrameGrabberRecognizer.html#/.name: grabFocusedFrames
Classes/MBCFrameGrabberRecognizer.html#/.abstract: Allow sending focused camera frames to MBCFrameGrabberRecognizerDelegate.

Classes/MBCFrameGrabberRecognizer.html#/.name: grabUnfocusedFrames
Classes/MBCFrameGrabberRecognizer.html#/.abstract: Allow sending unfocused camera frames to MBCFrameGrabberRecognizerDelegate.

Classes/MBCErrorReticle.html#/c:objc(cs).name: errorColor
Classes/MBCErrorReticle.html#/c:objc(cs).abstract: Custom tint color used for tinting reticleImage. Ignored if white.

Classes/MBCErrorReticle.html#/c:objc(cs).name: errorReticleImage
Classes/MBCErrorReticle.html#/c:objc(cs).abstract: Custom reticle image. Shown instead of default circle.

Classes/MBCDotsResultSubview.html#/c:obj.name: shouldIgnoreFastResults
Classes/MBCDotsResultSubview.html#/c:obj.abstract: If set YES, dots will not redraw until the animation is finished. This will make animation look much smoother on fast results.

Classes/MBCDotsResultSubview.html#/c:obj.name: charFadeInDuration
Classes/MBCDotsResultSubview.html#/c:obj.abstract: Duration of fade animation for each dot.

Classes/MBCDotsResultSubview.html#/c:obj.name: dotCount
Classes/MBCDotsResultSubview.html#/c:obj.abstract: Maximum number of dots shown on screen. This count has to be in range [20,50].

Classes/MBCDisplayableQuadDetection.html.name: detectionLocation
Classes/MBCDisplayableQuadDetection.html.abstract: Exact location of detected object on image.

Classes/MBCDisplayablePointsDetection.ht.name: points
Classes/MBCDisplayablePointsDetection.ht.abstract: Coordinates of points (CGPoint) of a detected object.

Classes/MBCDisplayableObject.html#/c:obj.name: transform
Classes/MBCDisplayableObject.html#/c:obj.abstract: Tranformation matrix which transforms the coordinate system in which the OCR layout is given

Classes/MBCDisplayableDetection.html#/c:.name: detectionStatus
Classes/MBCDisplayableDetection.html#/c:.abstract: Detection status which describes the status of detection

Classes/MBCDate.html#/c:objc(cs)MBCDate(.name: originalDateString
Classes/MBCDate.html#/c:objc(cs)MBCDate(.abstract: The original string used to create the date result

Classes/MBCDate.html#/c:objc(cs)MBCDate(.name: date
Classes/MBCDate.html#/c:objc(cs)MBCDate(.abstract: NSDate object which represents the same date as this result

Classes/MBCDate.html#/c:objc(cs)MBCDate(.name: isFilledByDomainKnowledge
Classes/MBCDate.html#/c:objc(cs)MBCDate(.abstract: Indicates that date does not appear on the document but is filled by our internal domain knowledge.

Classes/MBCCustomOverlayViewController.h.name: -init
Classes/MBCCustomOverlayViewController.h.abstract: Convenience initializer used for use cases when overlay view controller is instantiated from storyboard.

Classes/MBCCustomOverlayViewController.h.name: autorotateOverlay
Classes/MBCCustomOverlayViewController.h.abstract: If YES, Overlay View Controller will be autorotated independently of ScanningViewController.

Classes/MBCCustomOverlayViewController.h.name: showStatusBar
Classes/MBCCustomOverlayViewController.h.abstract: If YES, default camera overlay will display Status bar.

Classes/MBCCustomOverlayViewController.h.name: -reconfigureRecognizers:
Classes/MBCCustomOverlayViewController.h.abstract: Reconfigures current recognizer collection to new recognizer collection. Use this method to reconfigure what you wish to scan.

Classes/MBCCardNumberAnonymizationSettin.name: mode
Classes/MBCCardNumberAnonymizationSettin.abstract: Defines the mode of card number anonymization.

Classes/MBCCardNumberAnonymizationSettin.name: prefixDigitsVisible
Classes/MBCCardNumberAnonymizationSettin.abstract: Defines how many digits at the beginning of the card number remain visible after anonymization.

Classes/MBCCardNumberAnonymizationSettin.name: suffixDigitsVisible
Classes/MBCCardNumberAnonymizationSettin.abstract: Defines how many digits at the end of the card number remain visible after anonymization.

Classes/MBCCameraSettings.html#/c:objc(c.name: cameraPreset
Classes/MBCCameraSettings.html#/c:objc(c.abstract: Camera preset. With this property you can set the resolution of the camera

Classes/MBCCameraSettings.html#/c:objc(c.name: cameraType
Classes/MBCCameraSettings.html#/c:objc(c.abstract: Camera type. You can choose between front and back facing.

Classes/MBCCameraSettings.html#/c:objc(c.name: autofocusInterval
Classes/MBCCameraSettings.html#/c:objc(c.abstract: Interval between forcing two camera focuses. If <= 0, forced focuses arent performed

Classes/MBCCameraSettings.html#/c:objc(c.name: focusPoint
Classes/MBCCameraSettings.html#/c:objc(c.abstract: Point against which the autofocus will be performed

Classes/MBCCameraSettings.html#/c:objc(c.name: cameraMirroredHorizontally
Classes/MBCCameraSettings.html#/c:objc(c.abstract: Tells whether camera input images should be mirrored horizontally before processing

Classes/MBCCameraSettings.html#/c:objc(c.name: cameraMirroredVertically
Classes/MBCCameraSettings.html#/c:objc(c.abstract: Tells whether camera input images should be mirrored vertically before processing

Classes/MBCCameraSettings.html#/c:objc(c.name: previewZoomScale
Classes/MBCCameraSettings.html#/c:objc(c.abstract: Set the back side preview camera layer zoom factor. 1.0 means there is no zoom, 2.0 double the zoom - preview layer is 2x zoomed than video output.

Classes/MBCCameraSettings.html#/c:objc(c.name: -init
Classes/MBCCameraSettings.html#/c:objc(c.abstract: Designated initializer. Initializes the object with default settings (see above for defaults)

Classes/MBCCameraSettings.html#/c:objc(c.name: -calcSessionPreset
Classes/MBCCameraSettings.html#/c:objc(c.abstract: Returns an optimal AVFoundation session preset based on cameraPreset value.

Classes/MBCCameraSettings.html#/c:objc(c.name: -calcAutofocusRangeRestriction
Classes/MBCCameraSettings.html#/c:objc(c.abstract: Returns an optimal AVFoundation autofocus range restriction value based on cameraAutofocusRestriction.

Classes/MBCCameraReticle.html#/c:objc(cs.name: -startAnimating
Classes/MBCCameraReticle.html#/c:objc(cs.abstract: Starts animating the reticle. Does nothing if the reticle is already animating.

Classes/MBCCameraReticle.html#/c:objc(cs.name: -stopAnimating
Classes/MBCCameraReticle.html#/c:objc(cs.abstract: Stops animating the reticle. Does nothing if the reticle is not animating.

Classes/MBCCameraReticle.html#/c:objc(cs.name: -startDetecting
Classes/MBCCameraReticle.html#/c:objc(cs.abstract: Starts animating the detection spinner. Does nothing if the detection is already animating.

Classes/MBCCameraReticle.html#/c:objc(cs.name: -stopDetecting
Classes/MBCCameraReticle.html#/c:objc(cs.abstract: Stops animating the detection spinner. Does nothing if the detection is not animating.

Classes/MBCCameraReticle.html#/c:objc(cs.name: -resetAll
Classes/MBCCameraReticle.html#/c:objc(cs.abstract: Stops all animations and remove all layers to reset state to beginning

Classes/MBCCameraReticle.html#/c:objc(cs.name: -animateArcRotation
Classes/MBCCameraReticle.html#/c:objc(cs.abstract: Starts animating the reticle. Does nothing if the reticle is already animating.

Classes/MBCCameraReticle.html#/c:objc(cs.name: reticleImage
Classes/MBCCameraReticle.html#/c:objc(cs.abstract: Custom reticle image. Shown instead of default circle.

Classes/MBCCameraReticle.html#/c:objc(cs.name: reticleColor
Classes/MBCCameraReticle.html#/c:objc(cs.abstract: Custom tint color used for arc and progress animation. Default white.

Classes/MBCCameraReticle.html#/c:objc(cs.name: reticleDefaultColor
Classes/MBCCameraReticle.html#/c:objc(cs.abstract: Custom tint color used for tinting reticleImage. Ignored if white.

Classes/MBCBlinkCardRecognizerResult.htm.name: owner
Classes/MBCBlinkCardRecognizerResult.htm.abstract: Information about the payment card owner (name, company, etc.).

Classes/MBCBlinkCardRecognizerResult.htm.name: firstSideBlurred
Classes/MBCBlinkCardRecognizerResult.htm.abstract: Whether the first scanned side is blurred.

Classes/MBCBlinkCardRecognizerResult.htm.name: secondSideBlurred
Classes/MBCBlinkCardRecognizerResult.htm.abstract: Whether the second scanned side is blurred.

Classes/MBCBlinkCardRecognizerResult.htm.name: firstSideFullDocumentImage
Classes/MBCBlinkCardRecognizerResult.htm.abstract: Full image of the payment card from first side recognition.

Classes/MBCBlinkCardRecognizerResult.htm.name: secondSideFullDocumentImage
Classes/MBCBlinkCardRecognizerResult.htm.abstract: Full image of the payment card from second side recognition.

Classes/MBCBlinkCardRecognizerResult.htm.name: encodedFirstSideFullDocumentImage
Classes/MBCBlinkCardRecognizerResult.htm.abstract: JPEG-encoded full document image of the first side of the payment card. Available only if enabled with MBCEncodeFullDocumentImage encodeFullDocumentImage property.

Classes/MBCBlinkCardRecognizerResult.htm.name: encodedSecondSideFullDocumentImage
Classes/MBCBlinkCardRecognizerResult.htm.abstract: JPEG-encoded full document image of the second side of the payment card. Available only if enabled with MBCEncodeFullDocumentImage encodeFullDocumentImage property.

Classes/MBCBlinkCardRecognizerResult.htm.name: firstSideAnonymized
Classes/MBCBlinkCardRecognizerResult.htm.abstract: Whether the first scanned side is anonymized.

Classes/MBCBlinkCardRecognizerResult.htm.name: secondSideAnonymized
Classes/MBCBlinkCardRecognizerResult.htm.abstract: Whether the second scanned side is anonymized.

Classes/MBCBlinkCardRecognizerResult.htm.name: documentLivenessCheck
Classes/MBCBlinkCardRecognizerResult.htm.abstract: Document liveness check (screen, photocopy, hand presence) which can pass or fail.

Classes/MBCBlinkCardRecognizer.html#/c:o.name: result
Classes/MBCBlinkCardRecognizer.html#/c:o.abstract: Result of scanning Payment Card Front Recognizer

Classes/MBCBlinkCardRecognizer.html#/c:o.name: delegate
Classes/MBCBlinkCardRecognizer.html#/c:o.abstract: The object that acts as the delegate of the recognizer

Classes/MBCBlinkCardRecognizer.html#/c:o.name: extractExpiryDate
Classes/MBCBlinkCardRecognizer.html#/c:o.abstract: Should extract the payment card’s month of expiry

Classes/MBCBlinkCardRecognizer.html#/c:o.name: allowBlurFilter
Classes/MBCBlinkCardRecognizer.html#/c:o.abstract: Defines whether blured frames filtering is allowed

Classes/MBCBlinkCardRecognizer.html#/c:o.name: paddingEdge
Classes/MBCBlinkCardRecognizer.html#/c:o.abstract: Pading is a minimum distance from the edge of the frame and is defined as a percentage of the frame width. Default value is 0.0f and in that case

Classes/MBCBlinkCardRecognizer.html#/c:o.name: anonymizationSettings
Classes/MBCBlinkCardRecognizer.html#/c:o.abstract: Defines whether sensitive data should be redacted from the result.

Classes/MBCBlinkCardRecognizer.html#/c:o.name: handScaleThreshold
Classes/MBCBlinkCardRecognizer.html#/c:o.abstract: Hand scale is calculated as a ratio between area of hand mask and document mask.

Classes/MBCBlinkCardRecognizer.html#/c:o.name: handDocumentOverlapThreshold
Classes/MBCBlinkCardRecognizer.html#/c:o.abstract: This parameter is used to adjust heuristics that eliminate cases when the hand is present.

Classes/MBCBlinkCardRecognizer.html#/c:o.name: screenAnalysisMatchLevel
Classes/MBCBlinkCardRecognizer.html#/c:o.abstract: Screen analysis match level - higher if stricter.

Classes/MBCBlinkCardRecognizer.html#/c:o.name: photocopyAnalysisMatchLevel
Classes/MBCBlinkCardRecognizer.html#/c:o.abstract: Photocopy analysis match level - higher if stricter.

Classes/MBCBlinkCardOverlaySettings.html.name: glareStatusMessage
Classes/MBCBlinkCardOverlaySettings.html.abstract: Returns/sets glare status message that is shown if glare detection is turned on

Classes/MBCBlinkCardOverlaySettings.html.name: frontSideMessage
Classes/MBCBlinkCardOverlaySettings.html.abstract: Returns/sets status message that is shows when front side of payment card

Classes/MBCBlinkCardOverlaySettings.html.name: backSideMessage
Classes/MBCBlinkCardOverlaySettings.html.abstract: Returns/sets status message that is shows when back side of payment card

Classes/MBCBlinkCardOverlaySettings.html.name: showFlashlightWarning
Classes/MBCBlinkCardOverlaySettings.html.abstract: Defines whether glare warning will be displayed when user turn on a flashlight

Classes/MBCBlinkCardOverlaySettings.html.name: enableEditScreen
Classes/MBCBlinkCardOverlaySettings.html.abstract: Defines whether manual edit screen is enabled

Classes/MBCBlinkCardOverlaySettings.html.name: errorMoveCloser
Classes/MBCBlinkCardOverlaySettings.html.abstract: Instructions for the user to move the document closer.

Classes/MBCBlinkCardOverlaySettings.html.name: errorMoveFarther
Classes/MBCBlinkCardOverlaySettings.html.abstract: Instructions for the user to move the document farther.

Classes/MBCBlinkCardOverlaySettings.html.name: errorDocumentTooCloseToEdge
Classes/MBCBlinkCardOverlaySettings.html.abstract: Instructions for the user to move the document from the edge.

Classes/MBCBlinkCardOverlaySettings.html.name: scanningWrongSideMessage
Classes/MBCBlinkCardOverlaySettings.html.abstract: Instructions for the user when wrong side is being scanned.

Classes/MBCBlinkCardOverlaySettings.html.name: onboardingButtonTooltipDelay
Classes/MBCBlinkCardOverlaySettings.html.abstract: Option to configure when the onboarding help tooltip will appear.

Classes/MBCBlinkCardOverlaySettings.html.name: showOnboardingInfo
Classes/MBCBlinkCardOverlaySettings.html.abstract: Defines whether button for presenting onboarding screens will be present on screen.

Classes/MBCBlinkCardOverlaySettings.html.name: showIntroductionDialog
Classes/MBCBlinkCardOverlaySettings.html.abstract: Defines whether tutorial alert will be presented on appear.

Classes/MBCBaseOverlayViewController.htm.name: -reconfigureRecognizers:
Classes/MBCBaseOverlayViewController.htm.abstract: Reconfigures current recognizer collection to new recognizer collection. Use this method to reconfigure what you wish to scan.

Classes/MBCBaseOverlaySettings.html#/c:o.abstract: If YES, Overlay View Controller will be autorotated independently of ScanningViewController.

Classes/MBCBaseOverlaySettings.html#/c:o.name: showStatusBar
Classes/MBCBaseOverlaySettings.html#/c:o.abstract: If YES, default camera overlay will display Status bar.

Classes/MBCBaseOverlaySettings.html#/c:o.name: soundFilePath
Classes/MBCBaseOverlaySettings.html#/c:o.abstract: Full path to the sound file which is played when the valid result is scanned.

Classes/MBCBaseOcrOverlaySettings.html#/.abstract: Property that enables showing of flashing dots over characters being scanned.

Classes/MBCBaseOverlayViewController.htm.abstract: Common base class for default overlay view controllers

Classes.html#/c:objc(cs)MBCBlinkCardEdit.abstract: Navigation view controller for BlinkCard Edit View Controller with Light Style overriden

Classes/MBCBlinkCardOverlaySettings.html.abstract: Settings class containing UI information for BlinkCard

Classes/MBCBlinkCardOverlayViewControlle.abstract: Settings class containing UI information for BlinkCard

Classes/MBCBlinkCardRecognizerResult.htm.abstract: Class representing values obtained when scanning credit/debit cards

Classes/MBCCameraReticle.html.name: MBCCameraReticle
Classes/MBCCameraReticle.html.abstract: A camera reticle that locates at the center of screen and uses circle arc rotation to indicate that

Classes/MBCCameraSettings.html.abstract: Settings class containing parameters for camera capture

Classes/MBCCardNumberAnonymizationSettin.abstract: Holds the settings which control card number anonymization.

Classes/MBCCustomOverlayViewController.h.abstract: Custom Overlay View Controller is an abstract class for all custom overlay views placed on top View Controller.

Classes/MBCDate.html.abstract: This class represents a Date result scanned from the image. It supports obtaining raw NSDates, or raw strings

Classes/MBCDisplayableDetection.html.abstract: Represents a detection that can be displayed on screen.

Classes/MBCDisplayablePointsDetection.ht.abstract: Result of the detection of a point detector. Point Detectors are used for QR and similar barcodes

Classes/MBCDisplayableQuadDetection.html.abstract: Represents a detection that can be displayed on screen.

Classes/MBCDotsSubview.html.abstract: A wrapper around CAShapeLayer which is used for presenting a status about barcode detections

Classes.html#/c:objc(cs)MBCEntity.name: MBCEntity
Classes.html#/c:objc(cs)MBCEntity.abstract: Base class for all entities processors, recognizers, detectors…

Classes/MBCErrorReticle.html.abstract: A camera reticle detection that locates at the center of screen and uses circular rotation to indicate that

Classes/MBCFrameGrabberRecognizer.html.abstract: A recognizer that can returns success frame.

Classes.html#/c:objc(cs)MBCGlareStatusSu.name: MBCGlareStatusSubview
Classes.html#/c:objc(cs)MBCGlareStatusSu.abstract: Overlay subview presenting the status of glare detection.

Classes/MBCMicroblinkSDK.html.name: MBCMicroblinkSDK
Classes/MBCMicroblinkSDK.html.abstract: Entry class for all Microblink SDKs - used for setting up license key and to add support for

Classes/MBCOcrLayout.html.name: MBCOcrLayout
Classes/MBCOcrLayout.html.abstract: Class describing the layour of the document on which the OCR was preformed.

Classes/MBCOcrBlock.html.name: MBCOcrBlock
Classes/MBCOcrBlock.html.abstract: Class representing an Ocr Block. Block consists of one or more Ocr Lines.

Classes/MBCOcrLine.html.name: MBCOcrLine
Classes/MBCOcrLine.html.abstract: Class representing an Ocr line. line consists of one or more Ocr chars

Classes/MBCOcrChar.html.name: MBCOcrChar
Classes/MBCOcrChar.html.abstract: Class representing an individual OCR character obtained in the OCR process.

Classes/MBCPosition.html.name: MBCPosition
Classes/MBCPosition.html.abstract: Class representing a position on the image. It’s given as a box, with

Classes.html#/c:objc(cs)MBCOcrResultSubv.name: MBCOcrResultSubview
Classes.html#/c:objc(cs)MBCOcrResultSubv.abstract: Overlay subview presenting status of OCR detection. OCR results are displayed as green characters over detected locations.

Classes/MBCOverlayViewController.html.name: MBCOverlayViewController
Classes/MBCOverlayViewController.html.abstract: Overlay View Controller is an abstract class for all overlay views placed on top View Controller.

Classes/MBCQuadrangle.html.name: MBCQuadrangle
Classes/MBCQuadrangle.html.abstract: Class represents the quadrangle (arbitrary geometric object with 4 different corner points

Classes/MBCRecognizerCollection.html.abstract: Settings class containing settings related to scanner behaviour

Classes/MBCRecognizerRunner.html.abstract: Factory class containing static methods for creating camera view controllers.

Classes.html#/c:objc(cs)MBCRectDocumentS.abstract: Overlay subview presenting the document for scanning

Classes/MBCSuccessFrameGrabberRecognizer.abstract: A recognizer that can returns success frame.

Classes/MBCTapToFocusSubview.html.abstract: Overlay subview presenting the effect which happens when the user taps to focus
